__e: Well, Cat doesn't tell me anything... ever, so I might as well hear it from you.
Yeah, because if Cat doesn't turn it around, and quick,
Because the first thing out of your mouth was, "Cat doesn't know, right?"
Didn't seem right for the world to lose Cat Grant's mind.
